title: Missing LP?
body:
Today i was on 39 LP. I won a game straight after the servers were back from maintenance. At the end of the game my LP was "still loading" (or some words to that affect) in the end of game lobby.

I then played another and won, and my LP was 39 + 21 = 60. Hence I received nothing for the first game?

replies.body:
Hey,

We had an [issue after the maintenance](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/VKveAt3y-complete-scheduled-maintenance-30032016?comment=0007) where LP was not being recorded.  It was fixed after about an hour, but unfortunately any games that finished before the fix did not get their LP stats recorded.

Mindstar
